<title level="1" pfs="">[Ulizmila's Cauldron](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2162)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Ulizmila's Cauldron](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2162)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 28

**Perception** +4; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** -2

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 (13 when broken)

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +4 

**Will** +6 

construct armor
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 20

**Hardness**
9
</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Construct Armor** Like normal objects, Ulizmila's cauldron has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once Ulizmila's cauldron is reduced to less than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks and its Armor Class is reduced to 13.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
lid +8,
**Damage** 1d10+2 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Small, 2d6 fire, Rupture 3

</column>
name: Ulizmila's Cauldron
primary_source_raw: Crown of the Kobold King pg. 28
